titleStmt.title: Wonderful prodigies of judgment and mercy discovered in above three hundred memorable histories ... / impartially collected from antient and modern authors of undoubted authority and credit, and imbellished with divers curious pictures of several remarkable passages therein by R.B., author of the History of the wars of England, and the Remarks of London &c.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?

notesStmt.note: R.B. is a pseudonym for Nathaniel Crouch -- cf. Dict. nat. biog.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
